alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 29 at 5:35PM PST until January 31 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM TUESDAY TO 1 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Trinity, Northeastern Mendocino Interior, Southwestern Mendocino Interior and Southeastern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Tuesday to 1 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
